item.title: Mission Accomplished
item.description: I had been given some of the lynda courses at work to do so as prerequistes to complete before joining the Jio Cloud team. It was a one mamouth task to complete. Although it look a considerable amount of time and self motivation for the same to be completed, but finally its done and I am extremely happy about it.
